Package.Name: Champi HP Bars (Conflicts with A.) Enemy spotted status & B.) Friends Marker BOTH by oldskool
Package.Description:
MOD DESCRIPTION: Customizable tank health bars for the playerpanel.

features:
-draws background in vehicle class colors (see screenshot) or in standard green (own team) / red (enemy team)
-can show only remaining structure points or current/max structure points
-changeable graphics and layout - you can make your own backgrounds if you like

Note: the health bars of the enemy team are only updated when the opponent is spotted and you're in radio signal range (if you didn't spot it by yourself). This rule is also valid for your own team. With other words: YOU CAN'T SEE IF YOUR BLIND SHOT HIT AN OPPONENT! :)

credits:
-Yury Polyacov: For the permission to use his API in my mod. This mod used a modified version of the player panel API.
-spoter: For his settings GUI
Package.UpdateComment:
https://wot.champi.de/
https://wgmods.net/3411/

Conflicts with Battle Observer & with oldskool.playerspanel.api in
Dependency_playersPanelAPI_POLIROID_PROMOD
used by
Ingame_Misc_chatmods_FriendsMarker_Oldskool
Ingame_Info_Enemy_Spotted_Status (by Oldskool)

use Logic NotFlag = "NAND" = Not and for 
Dependency_playersPanelAPI_POLIROID_PROMOD

Champi HP Bars (Conflicts with A.) Enemy spotted status & B.) Friends Marker BOTH by oldskool & C.) Battle Observer)

Package.Name: PROTanki
Package.Description:
Combat efficiency calculator for World of Tanks.

Maud calculates the expected damage for each tank right during the battle.

The negative value of the damage shows how much you need to fill the damage so that its value is above average.

He considers the costs of silver spent in combat.
Package.UpdateComment: 2019-05-03: switched back from v1.2.1 to v1.2

Package.Name: Gold Ammo Visibility Mod
Package.Description:
Features
- Changes the color of hit effects
- Multiple colors choices available
- Works for all tanks in both teams
- Recolors penetrating hits, bouncing shots, ricochets, shots hitting the ground or other objects
- Does NOT recolor none penetrating hits or shots into water

This mod adds a short sparkling effect to penetrating APCR/HEAT hits. Not only will you be able to tell if an enemy tank is shooting gold rounds at your allied tanks (or at you), but also if one of your allies is a gold spammer. This information will help you determining whether to engage or not to engage an enemy.

FAQ
Q: The Mod isn't working.
A: Make sure Extra Effects are enabled in the settings under Graphics.


by lgfrbcsgo

features:

Package.Name: TessuMod - WOT/Teamspeak integration (installation guide in description)
Package.Description:
A modification for integrating TeamSpeak into Garage and Battle.

Only works with the 64bit version of Teamspeak!

YOU MUST ACTIVATE THE MOD IN TEAMSPEAK FIRST!
 to add it to your teamspeak installation, finish the installation of mods and then go to your WoT-directory (..\World_of_Tanks\mods\versiondir). there you doubleclick the file "tessumod_plugin_0.8.0_win64.ts3_plugin" and follow the on-screen-steps.

More instructions here: 
http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/433614-09171-tessumod-wotteamspeak-integration-mod-v0613-26032017/#topmost

Package.Name: Wide Border of Maps
Package.Description:
Mod is made to help people with color blindness. The line, that indicates the border of maps, is expanded to the edges of the map. Now don't notice her is almost impossible. "Full" and "Light" differ only in the degree of compressibility. 
WIDE - the border of maps is expanded to the edges of the map.
INTENSIVE - the border of maps is made in the thickness of 20 pixels (on the standard = 1 pixel).
GRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 10x10.
EXTRAGRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 50x50.
COMMAND - into the version "GRID" added the big numbering squares card.
SPG - into the version "GRID" added the small numbering squares card.
